_meta.target_use_case: Life planning and business development automation

financial_progress_tracker.name: Financial Progress Tracker
financial_progress_tracker.description: Track progress toward $2M ARR goal for relocation funding

grok_tasks.prompt: Analyze current revenue trends and project path to $2M ARR
Identify revenue acceleration opportunities and risks
Evaluate if exit strategy triggers should be activated

market_intelligence.name: Competitive Intelligence Monitor
market_intelligence.description: Monitor BigTech threats and market opportunities

grok_tasks.prompt: Scan latest AI/LLM industry news for competitive threats
Research EU tech visa requirements and policy changes
Analyze job market conditions in target EU countries

product_development_optimization.name: Product Development Optimizer
product_development_optimization.description: Optimize llmstruct development for market fit and revenue

grok_tasks.prompt: Analyze user feedback and prioritize features for EU enterprise customers
Evaluate API pricing strategies and revenue models
Review code quality and technical debt impact on scalability

relocation_readiness_assessment.name: Relocation Readiness Calculator
relocation_readiness_assessment.description: Continuous assessment of readiness to execute relocation plan

grok_analysis.prompt: Calculate relocation readiness score based on current financial and legal status
Identify blockers and recommend accelerated path to relocation

risk_monitoring.name: Personal and Business Risk Monitor
risk_monitoring.description: Monitor risks that could impact relocation timeline

grok_analysis.prompt: Assess geopolitical and economic risks in Montenegro, Spain, Portugal
Evaluate business continuity risks and mitigation strategies

daily_planning_assistant.name: Intelligent Daily Planner
daily_planning_assistant.description: AI-assisted daily planning aligned with strategic goals

grok_assistance.prompt: Generate optimized daily schedule based on strategic priorities and current context
Identify potential conflicts and suggest schedule adjustments

decision_support_system.name: Strategic Decision Assistant
decision_support_system.description: AI-powered decision support for complex choices

grok_analysis.prompt: Analyze decision options using decision matrix framework from personal planning system
Evaluate alignment with long-term strategic goals and risk tolerance

github_project_sync.name: GitHub Project Synchronization
github_project_sync.description: Sync project progress with GitHub issues and milestones

automation_rules.grok_task: Generate milestone description and success criteria
Update roadmap documentation with decision rationale

telegram_notification_system.name: Intelligent Telegram Notifications
telegram_notification_system.description: Smart notification system via Telegram with context awareness

grok_processing.prompt: Create concise daily progress summary for mobile notification
Format alert with appropriate urgency level and action items

validation_rules: All financial targets must be realistic and time-bound
Risk thresholds must align with personal risk tolerance
Automation levels must not exceed user comfort zone
Privacy settings must protect sensitive personal data
